ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh hehe, I thought he didn t think they sold them in Freeport.  Not all other towns have wizard guilds.. Rivervale I believe does not.  Only towns which are
ygData.messageBody:
Oh hehe, I thought he didn't think they sold them in Freeport. Not all
other towns have wizard guilds.. Rivervale I believe does not. Only towns
which are home to races that can be wizards would have them.

Tandeyan, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: McCartney, Michael R <Michael.McCartney2@...>
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 3:51 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Wizard Spell


>From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
>
>Uh, he wanted to know which other towns he could get spells in. =)
>
>As far as I know.. you can get wiz spells in any town.. at its wiz guild.
>
>Drev
>
